name: Illidari Inquisitor
text: Rush. After your hero attacks an enemy, this attacks it too.

name: Illidari Studies
text: Discover an Outcast card. Your next one costs (1) less.

name: Red Card
text: Make a minion go Dormant for 2 turns.

name: Magtheridon, Unreleased
text: [x]Dormant for 2 turns. While Dormant, deal 3 damage to all enemies at the end of your turn.

name: Return Policy
text: Discover a friendly Deathrattle card you've played this game. Trigger its Deathrattle.

name: Colifero the Artist
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw a minion. Transform all other friendly minions into copies of it.

name: Cliff Dive
text: [x]Summon 2 minions from your deck and give them Rush. They go back at the end of your turn.

name: Dangerous Cliffside
text: [x]Summon two 1/1 Pirates with Charge. After your hero attacks, reopen this.

name: Ravenous Felhunter
text: Deathrattle: Resurrect a friendly Deathrattle minion that costs (4) or less. Summon a copy of it.

name: Infiltrate
text:
Choose a minion.
Deal $3 damage to all other minions.

name: Grim Harvest
text: Draw a card. Summon a random Dormant Dreadseed.

name: Wyvern's Slumber
text: Choose One - Summon two Dormant Dreadseeds; or Deal $2 damage to all minions.

name: Infestation
text: [x]Get two 1-Cost Gorishi Stingers. Each one deals $2 damage and summons a 2/1 Grub with Rush.

name: Insect Claw
text: After your hero attacks, summon a 2/1 Grub with Rush.

name: Blob of Tar
text: [x]Poisonous, Taunt Deathrattle: Summon a 1/2 Blob with Poisonous and a 1/2 Blob with Taunt.
